Class List
Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
pl1DArrayImplements single-type one-dimensional variable arrays
pl2DArrayImplements single-type two-dimensional variable arrays
plAnonymousDistributionThe plAnonymousDistribution class implements a distribution having the user external function function as compute method
plArrayImplements single-type multidimensional variable arrays
plBayesianFilterThis class implements general purpose Bayesian Filters
plBayesianNetworkSimple helper for building a Bayesian network and using it for exact inference using discrete variables (continuous variables are allowed only when used as evidence ones)
plBayesLearn1dNormalWithKnownMeanThis class allows to make a Bayesian estimation of a one-dimensional Normal distribution with fixed mean when the prior distribution over the Normal precision (tau = 1 / sigma) is a Gamma distribution
plBayesLearn1dNormalWithKnownStandardDeviationThis class allows to make a Bayesian estimation of a one-dimensional Normal distribution with fixed standard deviation sigma0 when the prior distribution over the Normal mean is itself a Normal distribution
plBayesLearnBinomialThis class allows to make a Bayesian estimation of a Binomial distribution when the prior distribution over the Binomial parameter is a Beta distribution
plBayesLearnExponentialThis class allows to make a Bayesian estimation of an Exponential distribution when the prior distribution of the Exponential parameter is a Gamma distribution
plBayesLearnGammaThis class allows to make a Bayesian estimation of Gamma distributions
plBayesLearnLogNormalWithKnownShapeThis class allows to make a Bayesian estimation of a log-normal distribution with fixed shape parameter s when the prior distribution over the natural logarithm of the log-normal scale ln(m) is a normal distribution
plBayesLearnNdNormalWithKnownVarianceThis class allows to make a Bayesian estimation of a n-dimensional Normal distribution with fixed covariance matrix sigma0 when the prior distribution over the Normal mean is itself a Normal distribution
plBayesLearnObjectThis is the base class of all non-conditional incremental (adaptive) learning objects using a Bayesian criterion, by taking advantage of the conjugacy property
plBayesLearnPoissonThis class allows to make a Bayesian estimation of Poisson distributions
plBayesLearnProbTableThis class allows to make a Bayesian estimation of multinomial (ProbTable) distributions using Multinomial-Dirichlet conjugacy
plBetaThis class implements the Beta distribution
plBinomialThis class implements the binomial distribution
plBuiltinModelA Bayesian builtin model
plCndAnonymousDistributionThe plCndAnonymousDistribution class implements a conditional distribution having the user's external function function as compute method
plCndBetaThis class implements conditional Beta distributions
plCndBinomialConditional Binomial distribution on one-dimensional space
plCndDeterministicThe plCndDeterministic class implements deterministic dependencies using user-provided functions
plCndDistributionPlCndDistribution is the base class of all conditional probability (and density) distributions like P(A | B)
plCndExponentialThis class implements conditional Exponential distributions
plCndGammaThis class implements conditional Gamma distributions
plCndJtDistributionConditional distribution as returned by asking a question to a plJunctionTree
plCndLearnObjectThis template class implements conditional learning objects
plCndLogNormalThis class implements conditional lognormal distributions
plCndNormalThis class implements conditional normal distributions on one or multiple dimensional spaces
plCndPoissonConditional Poisson distribution on one-dimensional space
plCndUniformThis class implements conditional uniform distributions on one dimensional space
plCndUnknownThis class allows defining an unknown distribution on a set of variables left knowing an other set of variables right
plCndVonMisesThis class implements conditional Von Mises distributions
plCndWeibullThis class implements conditional Weibull distributions
plComputableObjectA computable object on is defined as an abstract object provided with a probability measure function compute( )
plComputableObjectListA plComputableObjectList is an STL-like list of plComputableObjects
plConcurrentHmmSetThis class implements a model for recognition and filtering using a set of HMMs
plContinuousIntervalTypeThis class implements continuous types defined as intervals
plContinuousTypeplContinuousType is the base class of all ProBT continuous types
plCSVDataDescriptorA data descriptor for data in CSV (comma-separated values) format
plCSVFileDataDescriptorA data descriptor for data in CSV (comma-separated values) format
plCSVLineParserThis class implements parsing utilities for a CSV file
plDataDescriptorThis abstract template class defines a sequential data container
plDeterministicThe plDeterministic class implements the "Dirac" or "Delta" function
plDirichletThe Dirichlet distribution
plDiscreteIntervalTypeThis class implements discretized continuous types defined as intervals
plDiscreteTypeplDiscreteType is the base class of all ProBT discrete types
plDistributionThe plDistribution class is the base class of all non-conditional probability (and density) distributions
plDistributionTableA plDistributionTable is a way to define a conditional distribution from a set of Computable Objects (Distributions and/or Conditional Distributions) having the same left variables than the building blocks
plEdgeScoreBase-class for decomposable edge scores
plEdgeScoreAICAkaike's Information Criterion used as an edge score
plEdgeScoreBDeuBayesian Dirichlet Equivalent Uniform used as an edge score
plEdgeScoreBICBayesian Information Criterian used as an edge score
plEdgeScoreEntropyEntropy
plEdgeScoreFromNodeScoreBase-class template for edge-scores constructed from a node score
plEdgeScoreMDLMinimum Description Length used as an edge score
plEdgeScoreMIMutual Information
plEdgeScoreMIDistanceNormalized metric variant of the Mutual Information
plEKFThis class implements the Extended Kalman Filter
plEMLearnerThis class implements a generic EM (Expectation-Maximization) learning algorithm (using incomplete data sets)
plEqualFrequenciesVariableDiscretizerSimple discretization algorithm providing n intervals with the same number of data points
plErrorA plError is an exception thrown when a fatal error is encountered in ProBT
plExponentialThis class implements the Exponential distribution
plExternalFunctionA function defined by the user, generaly used to define a plCndDeterministic
plExternalFunctionFromCA special kind of plExternalFunction defined by dynamically compiling C source code provided by the user
plExternalFunctionFromSourceA special kind of plExternalFunction defined by dynamically compiling source code provided by the user
plExternalObjectInterfaceInterface of object that provides the callback for an external function
plExternalProbFunctionA function defined by the user to be used as a probability or a density function
plExternalProbFunctionFromCA special kind of plExternalProbFunction defined by dynamically compiling C source code provided by the user
plExternalProbFunctionFromSourceA special kind of plExternalProbFunction defined by dynamically compiling source code provided by the user
plFloatMatrixA plFloatMatrix is an m x n matrix of elements of type plFloat
plFloatVectorA plFloatVector is a vector of n elements of type plFloat
plGammaThis class implements the Gamma distribution
plGraphThe plGraph class is used to obtain a a graphical representation of a joint distribution
plHMMThis class implements Hidden Markov Model (HMM)
plIneqConstraintThe plIneqConstraint class defines a conditional distribution representing an constraint_size-dimensional inequality constraint on the Binary Variable constraint_variable
plIntegerTypeThe plIntegerType class is used to create integer types with particular interval [min,max]
plJointDistributionThe plJointDistribution class is used to describe a probabilistic model by providing a decomposition of the joint distribution of the whole model variables as a product of elementary conditional and non conditional distributions
plJtDistributionNon-conditional distribution as returned by asking a question to a plJunctionTree
plJunctionTreeImplements exact inference using a junction tree
plKalmanFilterThis class implements the Linear Kalman Filter
plLabelTypeThe plLabelType class is used to create label types taking there values in a set of textual labels
plLearn1dNormalThis class allows to learn one-dimensional Normal (Gaussian) distributions
plLearnBetaThis class allows to learn Beta distributions
plLearnCndObjectThis is an abstract class for all conditional learning objects
plLearnDistributionTableThis class implements conditional learning objects as a map
plLearnDistribVectorThis class allows to learn a set of conditional and non-conditional distributions in the same time
plLearnerThis is the base class of all learning objects
plLearnExponentialThis class allows to learn exponential distributions
plLearnFrozenDistributionThis class implements a learning object that learns nothing
plLearnGammaThis class implements Gamma distributions ML learning
plLearnGMMThis class implements the Gaussian Mixture Model unsupervised learning
plLearnHistogramThe class for learning n dimensionnal histograms
plLearnLaplaceThis class allows to make a Bayesian estimation of multinomial (ProbTable) distributions using Laplace's formula
plLearnLidstoneThis class allows to make a Bayesian estimation of multinomial (ProbTable) distributions using Lidstone's formula
plLearnLinearRegressionThis implements the learning part of the linear regression model (aka Linear Gaussian)
plLearnLinearRegressionFamilyImplements a family of linear regressions (over a set of quantitative variables), indexed by a set of categorical variables
plLearnLogNormalThis class allows to learn log-normal distributions
plLearnMixtureModelThis class implements the Mixture Model unsupervised learning
plLearnNdNormalThis class allows to learn multi-dimensional Normal (Gaussian) distributions
plLearnNoisyORThis class implements the learning part of the NoisyOR discrimination model
plLearnObjectThis is the base class of all incremental (adaptive) learning objects
plLearnPoissonThis class allows to learn Poisson distributions
plLearnSoftmaxThis implements the learning part of the Softmax (aka multinomial logistic or multinomial logit) regression
plLearnSoftmaxFamilyImplements a family of softmax regressions (over a set of quantitative variables), indexed by a set of categorical variables
plLearnSparseHistogramA class for learning sparse histograms
plLinearRegressionThis implements the computation part of the linear regression model (aka Linear Gaussian)
plLogNormalA plLogNormal is a one-dimensional probability distribution on a single continuous variable
plMatrixDataDescriptorThis class implements a data descriptor for STL data matrices with possibly missing values
plMLLearnObjectThis is the base class of all Non-conditional incremental (adaptive) learning objects using the Maximum Likelihood criterion

plParticleFilterThis class implements a generic particle filtering algorithm
plPoissonThis class implements the Poisson distribution
plPolicyNetworkClass for solving decision problems using policy networks
plProbTableA plProbTable represents a table of probability values on discrete and/or continuous-by-interval variables
plRandomBasic random number generation utility functions
plRealTypeThe plRealType is used to create real types with a particular interval [min,max[
plSampleSpaceObjectA State Space Object
plScoreBase-class for scores
plSerializerThe purpose of this class is to register ProBT objects in order to save them to file archives and later restoring them
plSIRParticleFilterThis class implements the Sampling Importance Resampling (SIR) particle filtering algorithm
plSoftmaxThis implements the computation part of the Softmax (aka multinomial logistic or multinomial logit) regression

plTypeplType is the base class of all ProBT types

plUniformThe plUniform class implements 1-dimensional uniform distributions

plValuesA plValues is an object storing the values of a set of variables
